metadata.Title: CVE-2015-8239 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description:
The SHA-2 digest support in the sudoers plugin in sudo after 1.8.7 allows local users with write permissions to parts of the called command to replace them before it is executed.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-8239` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

sudo - 1.8.16-0ubuntu1
sudo-ldap - 1.8.16-0ubuntu1
No subscription required

notes.Note: sbeattie> command digests are available only in 1.8.7 and higher

criterions.comment: sudo package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.8.16-0ubuntu1').
